introduction.description2: Currently working as a freelance developer, I channel my imagination and motivation into ambitious projects. Always seeking challenges, I aim to create, innovate, and bring meaning to my work.

items.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
items.description: After a general baccalaureate and a year in Physical Measurements, I finally decided to dive into computer science at IUT d'Orsay!

items.title: Gameplay Developer Internship
items.description: My first experience in video games! My mission was to develop a web game creation tool using a proprietary game engine.

items.title: Freelance Developer
items.description: Following a successful internship, I continued my collaboration with the company as an independent contractor.

items.title: Multiplayer Developer Internship
items.description: After an enriching initial experience, I wanted to take on more responsibilities within the company and deepen my knowledge of online game development.

future.mainText: After obtaining my Bachelor's in Computer Science (BAC+3), I would like to continue my studies up to a Master's degree (BAC+5), whether in an engineering school or a university Master's program. I enjoy learning and deepening my knowledge, and given the opportunity, I would even consider pursuing a Specialized Master's or a PhD. These paths would not only allow me to specialize but also contribute to advancing knowledge in my field.
future.additionalText: Additionally, I'm particularly interested in teaching, as sharing knowledge is a vocation close to my heart. However, before considering a teaching role, I first want to build my career in either the public or private sector. Gaining solid professional experience will not only help me master my field better but also allow me to share my expertise in a more relevant and meaningful way when the time comes.

projects.title: Card Game
projects.description: Automatic card game developed in C/C++ on Replit. Build your deck from numerous available cards and battle against another player or bots. May the best win!

projects.title: FEURnite
projects.description: A "Fortnite" clone with ducks. Multiplayer battle royale game set on floating islands - watch out for collapsing terrain! Developed with Unity and Photon for multiplayer.

projects.title: 2D Platformer
projects.description: Basic 2D platformer game developed in Vanilla JavaScript with Canvas API. Implemented custom animation, collision detection and camera systems.

tools: I work on a laptop running Arch Linux with the Hyprland desktop environment. For coding, I use Neovim and manage my projects with GitHub and its CI/CD pipelines.
